170


samoqalaqo, samewarmeo da gakotrebis 


saqmeTa palata 


Semadgenloba: 


mixeil gogiSvili


 (Tavmjdomare, momxsenebeli), 


roza nadiriani, Teimuraz Todria 


sakasacio palatam saqmis zepiri mosmenis gareSe ga
